answers.answer: I wanna know as well I'm almost 32weeks is it normal

If it smells like bleach or its ALOT like u r having to change underwear alot or through a pad or so thats leaking water... but could be due to baby putting pressure on your cervix getting ready to come, i would bring it up to dr at next appointment

I just got checked because I had so much.  They said it was normal I came back normal for infection and it was not amniotic fluid. Amniotic fluid definitely smells like chlorine so glad I'm not the only one that thinks that.

I'll be 34 weeks tomorrow and having a lot of discharge since week 30. I went to the hospital twice and they tolde its normal. However my doctor told me i have these discharge because i have gestational diabetes.
Doc told me its because your cervix is thinning out a little but its very normal as long as its just a clear mucus!

question: I'm due February 12th and have been experiencing a lot of discharge lately. It's just clear odorless fluid, enough  to notice every time I use the bathroom. Should I be worried?????
title: Increase in discharge
